attributes.name: Cowl of Doom
attributes.description: “Unleash hell upon them.”

attributes.name: Cowl of the Augur
attributes.description: “Prey cannot escape this sharp-sighted gaze.”

attributes.name: Cowl of the Green Seer
attributes.description: "Look deep into the woods. What do you find?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Look deep into the woods. What do you find?"

attributes.name: Critter Crushers
attributes.description: "Rabbits beware."

attributes.name: Crown of Cruelty
attributes.description: "Spiked barbs dig into your head as you place the helm upon your head. Your pain becomes your rage."
attributes.parsed_description: "Spiked barbs dig into your head as you place the helm upon your head. Your pain becomes your rage."

attributes.name: Crushing Grips
attributes.description: "Grotesquely large, these gauntlets are dense enough to pummel a rock into dust or crush the windpipe of a would-be bandit."
attributes.parsed_description: "Grotesquely large, these gauntlets are dense enough to pummel a rock into dust or crush the windpipe of a would-be bandit."

attributes.name: Crystalline Boots
attributes.description: These boots really put a sprig in your step.
attributes.parsed_description: These boots really put a sprig in your step.

attributes.name: Crystalline Chestpiece
attributes.description: The combination of materials seems to grant this armor a unique feel.
attributes.parsed_description: The combination of materials seems to grant this armor a unique feel.

attributes.name: Crystalline Gloves
attributes.description: How you can flex your fingers in these heavy wooden gauntlets is a marvel of craftsmanship.
attributes.parsed_description: How you can flex your fingers in these heavy wooden gauntlets is a marvel of craftsmanship.

attributes.name: Crystalline Helm
attributes.description: "These spriggans appear to have an artisic sense, having shaped this armor to reseble a hammerhead shark."
attributes.parsed_description: "These spriggans appear to have an artisic sense, having shaped this armor to reseble a hammerhead shark."

attributes.name: Crystalline Pants
attributes.description: These pants really put a sprig in your step.
attributes.parsed_description: These pants really put a sprig in your step.

attributes.name: Cultist's Ritual Hood
attributes.description: "The ceremonial garb of the cultists is as important to them as their spells."
attributes.parsed_description: "The ceremonial garb of the cultists is as important to them as their spells."

attributes.name: Cutlass Keys Guardsman's Breastplate
attributes.description: A heavy breastplate featuring the colors of Cutlass Keys, given as a gift for helping the townspeople.
attributes.parsed_description: A heavy breastplate featuring the colors of Cutlass Keys, given as a gift for helping the townspeople.

attributes.name: Dauntless Cry
attributes.description: "Dive in, headlong. Let the enemy know you approach. It's fairer that way."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dive in, headlong. Let the enemy know you approach. It's fairer that way."

attributes.name: Dawn's Obscurer
attributes.description: Rewarded for completing the quest, 'The Scenic Route'.
attributes.parsed_description: Rewarded for completing the quest, 'The Scenic Route'.

attributes.name: Daywear Boots
attributes.description: Even daywear needs to be tough in Aeternum.
attributes.parsed_description: Even daywear needs to be tough in Aeternum.

attributes.name: Deathwalker's Stompers
attributes.description: "Stomping on the risen dead is one of the most efficient ways to return them to death."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stomping on the risen dead is one of the most efficient ways to return them to death."

attributes.name: Deceit's Design
attributes.description: "The world would move as he wishes, but would not take shape as he expects."
attributes.parsed_description: "The world would move as he wishes, but would not take shape as he expects."

attributes.description: The armor of a Deepmist Spy.
